Plot: A documentary chronicling sports legend Lance Armstrong's improbable rise and ultimate fall from grace.
Title: The Armstrong Lie
Actors: Reed Albergotti, Betsy Andreu, Frankie Andreu, Lance Armstrong
tomatoConsensus: Smartly constructed and scathingly sharp, The Armstrong Lie presents an effective indictment of its unscrupulous subject -- as well as the sports culture that spawned him.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
